Contributor: Sindelar, F., artist.; United States. Fuel Administration, publisher.; Latham Litho & Ptg. Co., lithographer.;
Description: Text says that Uncle Sam needs that extra shovelful of coal to preserve a soldier's life. So save the coal. Illustration shows Uncle Sam standing behind a man shoveling the coal into the furnace.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Uncle Sam needs that extra Shovelful
